name: Unstable Chamber 2020
description:
First ever Game Jam submission, it's pretty bad but it has some cheap comedy and a silly concept if you've got a few minutes to spare.

I've attached the project folder if anyone was curious but it's all pretty bad code I tried to cut every corner I could.

It was fun but I definitely should have spent a bit more time planning and making one or two features that were really fun and interactive because it got out of control. ( aha bad comedy 101 )

Thanks.
